entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch doesn't respect configuration arg #36611
  • Containers: support specifying a prefix to the container repository #36595
  • No frameworks were found but actually installed #36594
  • TaskCanceledException: A task was canceled. hitting ctrl-c during container create #36593

Closed

  • Is it possible to use Microsoft.Build.NoTargets with no target framework? #36610

PullRequests

Merged

  • skip packageInstall test for Ubuntu #36615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2306389 #36497
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • upgrade stage 0 and unwind a few steps that were done for the 9.0 upg… #36437
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch back to the RC2 build since GA has gone internal. #36578
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36584
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
